welcome_message_body: Welcome to Woodland Park, where the charm of small-town America and the beauty of the Rocky Mountains meet. Get ready to experience our friendly community and all the outdoor activities and stunning landscapes that make this city famous. Enjoy your stay and make the most out of your visit to Woodland Park!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mostly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mostly international flights.

wifi.note: Limited free WiFi access is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights and is home to many major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves a mix of domestic and international flights and is home to Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal is the largest at JFK and serves a mix of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively used by JetBlue Airways for their domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights and is home to British Airways and other major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively used by American Airlines for their domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after accepting the terms and conditions.
